trans-unit.source: HealthTap is a platform for me to participate in patient education. Indeed, it's also a place where doctors can learn pearls from each other, and that's very valuable.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap es una plataforma que me permite participar en la educación del paciente. En efecto, también es un lugar donde doctores pueden aprender perlas el uno del otro, y eso es muy valioso.

trans-unit.source: Who are the doctors on HealthTap? Are they all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing? How are they selected?
trans-unit.target: ¿Quiénes son los doctores en HealthTap? ¿Todos son doctores acreditados en los EE.UU. con buena reputación? ¿Cómo son seleccionados?

trans-unit.source: All doctors on HealthTap are licensed to practice medicine in the U.S. and are in good standing. They include doctors from leading U.S. medical institutions (like Stanford and Harvard), as well as private practices from across the country. HealthTap Medical Experts are independent third parties, and are not employed by or affiliated with HealthTap. Admission to the HealthTap network is by application and invitation only.
trans-unit.target: Todos los doctores en HealthTap están acreditados para practicar medicina en los EE.UU. y tienen buena reputación. Están incluidos doctores de instituciones médicas líderes en los EE.UU. (como Stanford y Harvard), así como consultorios privados de todo el país. Los Expertos Médicos de HealthTap son terceras partes independientes, y son empleados de o están afiliados con HealthTap. La admisión a la red de HealthTap es solo por aplicación e invitación.

trans-unit.source: No

trans-unit.source: 可信赖的顶尖专家
trans-unit.target: 可信赖的顶尖专家

trans-unit.source: 从涵盖137个专科领域的数千名美国顶尖医生团队中选择专家会诊，帮助您更全面地了解病情，做出明智的治疗决定。
trans-unit.target: 从涵盖137个专科领域的数千名美国顶尖医生团队中选择专家会诊，帮助您更全面地了解病情，做出明智的治疗决定。

trans-unit.source: 咨询顶尖美国医生
trans-unit.target: 咨询顶尖美国医生

trans-unit.source: 通过我们的网络您可咨询71000多名美国顶级医生，涉及超过137个专科领域，附属于世界顶尖的医院、大学和医疗机构。我们非常重视信用和服务质量，对所有的医生都进行了严格的资质审核和质控把关。我们仅选择各个专科领域的顶级医生，以确保客户得到最专业的会诊咨询服务。
trans-unit.target: 通过我们的网络您可咨询71000多名美国顶级医生，涉及超过137个专科领域，附属于世界顶尖的医院、大学和医疗机构。我们非常重视信用和服务质量，对所有的医生都进行了严格的资质审核和质控把关。我们仅选择各个专科领域的顶级医生，以确保客户得到最专业的会诊咨询服务。

trans-unit.source: 我曾经从医生手里拿到过一份报告，那份报告我完全看不懂。那周我预约了一次HealthTap咨询，接触到一位特别棒的医生，他的详细说明让我充分理解了报告的准确意思，非常专业和友好！谢谢你HealthTap！
trans-unit.target: 我曾经从医生手里拿到过一份报告，那份报告我完全看不懂。那周我预约了一次HealthTap咨询，接触到一位特别棒的医生，他的详细说明让我充分理解了报告的准确意思，非常专业和友好！谢谢你HealthTap！

trans-unit.source: This HealthTap Software Distribution Agreement for Independent Brokers (this “Agreement”) is entered into by and between HealthTap, Inc., a Delaware corporation, having its principal place of business at 270 University Avenue, Floor 2, Palo Alto, California 94301 (“HealthTap”), and the broker entity or individual broker signatory to this Agreement (the “Licensee”), effective as of the date of execution of this Agreement by both parties (“Effective Date”). If this Agreement is entered into by or on behalf of an entity, it shall govern all brokers or agents of such entity and any broker not covered by this Agreement shall have no right or license to distribute the HealthTap Software.
trans-unit.target: Este Acuerdo de Distribución de Software de HealthTap para Agentes Independientes (este “Acuerdo”) es concertado por y entre HealthTap, Inc., una corporación de Delaware, que tiene su lugar de negocios princial en 270 University Avenue, Floor 2, Palo Alto, California 94301 (”HealthTap”), y la entidad intermediaria o el intermediario individual signatario de este Acuerdo (el “Licenciatario”), efectivo desde la fecha de ejecución de este Acuerdo por las dos partes (”Fecha Efectiva”). Si este Acuerdo se concerta por o en nombre de una entidad, gobernara a todos los intermediarios o agentes de dicha entidad y cualquier otro intermediario no cubierto por este Acuerdo no tendrá derecho o licencia para distribuir Software de HealthTap.

trans-unit.resname: EDIT YOUR QUESTION<span class="sub_title">Want to change your question? You can do that here. Remember, proper grammar and correct spelling increase your chances of getting a great answer!
trans-unit.source: EDIT YOUR QUESTION <span class="sub_title">Want to change your question? You can do that here. Remember, proper grammar and correct spelling increase your chances of getting a great answer!
trans-unit.target: EDITAR TU PREGUNTA <span class="sub_title">¿Quieres cambiar tu pregunta? Puedes hacer eso aquí. Recuerda, ¡gramática y ortografía correctas incrementan tus probabilidades de obtener un grandiosa respuesta!

trans-unit.resname: GUIDELINESTo ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines
trans-unit.source: GUIDELINES To ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines
trans-unit.target: INSTRUCCIONES Para hacer una pregunta estupenda a HealthTap, utiliza estas útiles instrucciones

trans-unit.resname:
Sweat the details... at least a little.Hide examples
Good:I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good:Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.source:
Sweat the details... at least a little. Hide examples
Good: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good: Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.target:
Suda los detalles... al menos un poco. Esconder ejemplos
Bueno: Tenía un sarpullido seco con comezón en la parte de adentro de mis codos por 3 semanas. ¿Cuáles podrían ser las causas?
No tan bueno: ¿Por qué tengo un sarpullido?

trans-unit.resname:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers.Show examples
Good:What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good:Why back pain?
trans-unit.source:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers. Show examples
Good: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good: Why back pain?
trans-unit.target:
Hazla suficientemente larga para ser útil para otros. Millones de personas de todo el mundo pueden leer tu pregunta y sus respuestas. Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: ¿Qué podría causar dolor de espalda baja después de hacer el qué hacer de la casa? – ¿Nunca he tenido una lesión en la espalda?
No tan bueno: Why back pain?

trans-unit.resname:
Include sex/gender, when relevant.Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful:What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary:What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?
trans-unit.source:
Include sex/gender, when relevant. Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?
trans-unit.target:
Incluye sexo/género cuando sea relevante. Mostrar ejemplos
Sexo/Género útil: Qué podria causar una bola, del tamaño de una moneda, justo debajo del seno de hombre.
Sexo/Género no necesario: ¿Qué podría causar una bolita, del tamaño de un frijo, debajo de la piel del dorso de mi mano?

trans-unit.resname:
Include an approximate age.Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers:For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?
trans-unit.source:
Include an approximate age. Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?
trans-unit.target:
Incluye edad aproximada. Mostrar ejemplos
Diferentes edades llevarán a diferentes respuestas: Por los últimos 2 días, mi hijo de 15 años ha tenido una fiebre y ha estado cojeando como si le doliera su pierna. ¿Qué son algunas de las cosas que podrían causar esto?
¿Por qué mi bebé de 3 años ha estado experimentando fiebre y cojea como si le doliera su pierna desde los últimos 2 días?

trans-unit.resname:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant.Show examples
Good:My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good:My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?
trans-unit.source:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant. Show examples
Good: My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?
trans-unit.target:
Incluye peso, edad y unidades de dosis donde sea relevante Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: Mi hijo tiene 3 años, pesa 27 libras y tiene 34 pulgadas de estatura. ¿Está bien su tamaño para su edad?
No tan bien: Mi hijo tiene 3, pesa 27 y mide 34. ¿Está bien para su edad?

trans-unit.resname:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication.Show examples
Good:My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good:My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?
trans-unit.source:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication. Show examples
Good: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?
trans-unit.target:
Por favor, usa la el nombre de marca y genérico para medicamentos, especialmente si estás fuera de los EE.UU. o preguntando sobre un medicamento poco común. Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: Mi hijo tiene 5 años, 55lbs, y tiene una fiebre. Tomó 5ml de Tylenol (acetaminofen120mg/5ml), pero su fiebre persiste. ¿Pueden los niños de este peso y edad tomar una dosis más grande de Tylenol?
Not tan bueno: Mi hijo tiene 5, pesa 55 y tiene una fiebre. Intenté con Tylenol pero fiebre persiste. ¿Tomar más Tylenol?

trans-unit.resname:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer.Show examples
Good:How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good:Do antibiotics work in children?
trans-unit.source:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer. Show examples
Good: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good: Do antibiotics work in children?
trans-unit.target:
Trata de evitar preguntas que hagan que los doctores tengan que contestar SÍ o NO. Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: ¿Cómo funcionan los antibióticos en niños jovenes de edad escolar?
Not tan bueno: ¿Funcionan los antibióticos en niños?

trans-unit.resname:
Try to leave opinions out.Show examples
Good:Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good:Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?
trans-unit.source:
Try to leave opinions out. Show examples
Good: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?
trans-unit.target:
Intenta dejar fuera las opiniones. Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: ¿Por qué algunas personas están en contra de las vacunas, cuando las vacunas se usan para prevenir males enfermedades?
No tan bueno: ¿La gente anti vacuna está perdida o en solo en negación?

trans-unit.resname:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang.Show examples
Good:I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good:Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?
trans-unit.source:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang. Show examples
Good: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?
trans-unit.target:
Entre más claro, mejor. Usa buena gramática, evita blasfemias y aléjate de la jerga. Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: Estaba haciendo curIs de bíceps y sentí un dolor quemante en mis bíceps. ¿Podría tener un desgarro muscular?
No tan bueno: Haciendo curls, sentí algo y me duele el brazo?

trans-unit.resname:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions.Show examples
Good:My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good:And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?
trans-unit.source:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions. Show examples
Good: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?
trans-unit.target:
No asumas conocimiento de antecedentes personales. Los doctores de HealthTap a menudo no habrán visto tus preguntas previas. Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: A mi hijo de 2 años le pusieron tubos en los oídos hace 2 meses y ahora tiene fiebre y le está saliendo puso del oído derecho. ¿Es común esto?
No tan bueno: Y ya tiene 2 días, y también le está saliendo pus?

trans-unit.resname:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue).Show examples
Good:I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good:Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.
trans-unit.source:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue). Show examples
Good: I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good: Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.
trans-unit.target:
Para conservar privacidad, deja fuera tu nombre y los nombres de otros (a menos de que ese “otro” sea una celebridad que haya hablado públicamente acerca de un problema). Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: Acabo de escuchar al actor Michael J. Fox hablar acerca de su enfermedad de Parkinson. ¿Hay nuevos buenos tratamientos que hayan salido en los últimos 3 años?
No tan bueno: Hola doctor. Mi nombre es John Doe, y me pregunto si hay buenos tratamientos para la enfermedad de Parkinson.

trans-unit.resname:
Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing.Show examples
Good:How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good:How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?
trans-unit.source:
Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing. Show examples
Good: How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good: How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?
trans-unit.target:
Evita usar demasiadas abreviaciones porque se pueden poner muy confusas. Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: ¿Cómo sabes si estás embarazada si nunca has tenido periodos regulares?
No tan bueno: ¿Cómo sabs si stas panzona si nunc tienes priods regus?

trans-unit.resname:
Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap.Show examples
Good:I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
Not so good:Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?
trans-unit.source:
Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap. Show examples
Good: I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
Not so good: Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?
trans-unit.target:
Pregunta en inglés. Este es el idioma comúnmente usado por doctores en HealthTap. Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: Podé unos árboles el fin de semana pasado y mi brazo me ha estado doliendo por 2 días. ¿Podría ser está la causa?
No tan bueno: ¿Por qué mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?

trans-unit.resname: MESSAGEPrivate and HIPPA secure
trans-unit.source: MESSAGE Private and HIPPA secure
trans-unit.target: MENSAJE Privado y protegido por HIPAA

trans-unit.resname: Start a Private Conversation<span class="sub_title">Enhance your HealthTap experience
trans-unit.source: Start a Private Conversation <span class="sub_title">Enhance your HealthTap experience
trans-unit.target: Comenzar una conversación privada <span class="sub_title">Mejora tu experiencia HealthTap

trans-unit.resname: Start a Private ConversationAsk a more detailed question to a doctor of your choice here, in a private, HIPAA-secure one-on-one setting for a small fee. Add images, scans or supporting documents for an even more personalized answer.
trans-unit.source: Start a Private Conversation Ask a more detailed question to a doctor of your choice here, in a private, HIPAA-secure one-on-one setting for a small fee. Add images, scans or supporting documents for an even more personalized answer.
trans-unit.target: Comienza una Conversación Privada Haz una pregunta más detallada a un médico de tu elección aquí, en un entorno privado uno a uno protegido por HIPAA, por una pequeña tarifa. Add images, scans or supporting documents for an even more personalized answer.

trans-unit.resname: ASK A DOCTOR A QUESTIONGet help directly from any HealthTap doctor of your choice using HealthTap Credits to pay the doctor for their time.
trans-unit.source: ASK A DOCTOR A QUESTION Get help directly from any HealthTap doctor of your choice using HealthTap Credits to pay the doctor for their time.
trans-unit.target: HAZ UNA PREGUNTA AL MÉDICO Obtén ayuda directa de cualquier médico HealthTap de tu elección utilizando los Créditos HealthTap para pagar al médico por su tiempo.

trans-unit.resname: REFER TO A COLLEAGUEKnow someone who can answer this question? That’s great! Just let us know who and we’ll send it to them.
trans-unit.source: REFER TO A COLLEAGUE Know someone who can answer this question? That’s great! Just let us know who and we’ll send it to them.
trans-unit.target: REMITIR A UN COLEGA ¿Conoces a alguien que pueda responder esta pregunta? ¡Eso es grandioso! Sólo permítenos saber quién y se la enviaremos.

trans-unit.resname: This question has been sent to doctors in the <%= App.session.referSpecialty %> field
trans-unit.source: This question has been sent to doctors in the <%= App.session.referSpecialty %> field
trans-unit.target: Esta pregunta ha sido enviada a los médicos en el campo de <%= App.session.referSpecialty %>

trans-unit.resname: Earn {span_tag_start}{points}{span_tag_end} points and a boost in your Helpfulness and DocScores.
trans-unit.source: Earn {span_tag_start}{points}{span_tag_end} points and a boost in your Helpfulness and DocScores.
trans-unit.target: Gana {span_tag_start}{points}{span_tag_end} puntos y un impulso en tu Utilidad y DocScores.

trans-unit.resname: *HealthTap credits are not awarded for clarifications, appointment requests, responses sent after 72 hours of receiving a patient message or when a patient uses your promo code for payment.
trans-unit.source: *HealthTap credits are not awarded for clarifications, appointment requests, responses sent after 72 hours of receiving a patient message or when a patient uses your promo code for payment.
trans-unit.target: *Los créditos HealthTap no son otorgados por aclaratorias, solicitudes de citas, respuestas enviadas luego de 72 horas de recibir un mensaje del paciente o cuando un paciente utiliza tu código de promoción por el pago.

trans-unit.resname: HealthTap is for informational purposes only. Content on HealthTap (including answers) should not be used for medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment, and interactions on HealthTap do not create a doctor-patient relationship. Never disregard or delay seeking professional medical advice in person because of anything on HealthTap. Call your doctor or 911 (in the U.S.) if you think you may have a medical emergency. See {link_tag_start}Additional Information ›{link_tag_end}

El contenido en HealthTap (incluyendo las respuestas) no deberán usarse para asesoría, diagnóstico o tratamiento médico, y las interacciones en HealthTap no crean una relación médico-paciente. Nunca hagas caso omiso o te atrases en buscar asesoría médica profesional en persona por nada del mundo en HealthTap. Llama a tu médico o al 911 (en los EE.UU.) si crees que puedas tener una emergencia médica. Ver {link_tag_start}Información Adicional ›{link_tag_end}

trans-unit.resname:
We're sorry, but it seems your internet connection does not meet our minimum requirement for consults. Please try again with a more stable network.

For assistance, you may contact us at {link_tag_start}expertsupport@healthtap.com{link_tag_end}
trans-unit.source:
We're sorry, but it seems your internet connection does not meet our minimum requirement for consults. Please try again with a more stable network.

For assistance, you may contact us at {link_tag_start}expertsupport@healthtap.com{link_tag_end}
trans-unit.target:
Lo sentimos, pero parece que tu conexión a internet no cumple nuestros requisitos mínimos para las consultas. Por favor, intenta de nuevo con una red más estable.

Para asistencia, puedes contactarnos al {link_tag_start}expertsupport@healthtap.com{link_tag_end}
